body:
Comment 3 by **jon.forums**: 
My Win7 32bit cross builds have used this PowerShell script for a long time

  http://paste.ubuntu.com/5717754/

Only in the last day has the build broken.

For the native windows build (1st build) CGO_ENABLED is set and `all.bat` is used. For
the following cross builds, CGO_ENABLED is cleared and `make.bat --no-clean` is used.

If this is no longer correct, what is the right way?
